thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ascom Holding FY Net Revenues Up At Around CHF 309 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ascom Holding FY Net Revenues Up At Around CHF 309 Mln
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - ASCOM HOLDING AG:
* ACHIEVED FOR FY NET REVENUE GROWTH OF 3% AND INCREASE OF INCOMING ORDERS OF 7.2%
* GENERATED FOR FY NET REVENUES OF AROUND CHF 309 MILLION, REPRESENTING A GROWTH RATE OF 3%
* INCOMING ORDERS INCREASED BY 7.2% TO AROUND CHF 325 MILLION FOR FISCAL YEAR 2017
* EXPECTS FOR FISCAL YEAR 2017 EBITDA MARGIN OF ABOUT 14%, WHICH IS IN LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS Source text - bit.ly/2AOa1GU Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
